channel.title: Astromancer [BD Investigative] and Zodiac [Unseen Social]
channel.description:
> [color=blue]**The Astromancer** [/color] >- >[color=blue] **BD Investigative**[/color] > > **Passive:** > **Star Map:** You will always get correct investigative results. > > **Day:** > **Comet's Trail (2 use):** Choose a player. You will be notified if you visit the same person as them tonight. > **Inner Cosmos (1 use):** Choose 2 players. They will receive correct feedback tonight. > > **Night:** > **Stargazing (inf use):** You will receive all class types that visited your target tonight. Doesn't show repeated class types. Cannot target King or self. Special classes show as Investigative. > **Galaxy Cross (2 use):** Choose 2 players. You will be notified if they visit the other players class type tonight.
---
> [color=purple]**The Zodiac** [/color] >- > [color=purple]**Unseen Social**[/color] > > **Day:** > **Outer Void (1 use):** Choose 2 players. Your targets will not receive any results tonight and will believe they were occupied. > > **Night:** > **Constellation (3 use):** Frame a player. If they get executed the next day they will appear as their converted class or assassin if they are convert immune. If you succesfully disguise someone you will lose all charges of this ability. > **Celestial Object (1 use):** Make an Unseen member appear as a Class of your chosing to players investigating them tonight.
--- Created because of a meme, but I'm feeling quite confident in this suggestion. Semi-confirmable Invest with some new and creative abilities.
~~Still bad at thinking up conversions so I'm gonna postpone that indefinitely :slight_smile:~~
Well would you look at that; I actually did a convert for once :smiley:

item.title: Astromancer [BD Investigative] and Zodiac [Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
That’s more of a princess thing.

Either way it’s just weird and would make me wish I was an observer.

Very redundant class. Yes I know the chronomancer exists, I don’t like the chronomancer.

Read full topic

Galaxy Cross (2 use): Choose 2 players. You will be notified if they visit the other players class type tonight.

I consider this to be Maid-like.

But still, rare convert + rare spawn, might cause issues.

item.title: Astromancer [BD Investigative] and Zodiac [Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Kape
item.description:
Shrimpy:

So basically an investigative version of Hunter’s Mark? I like it.

Better than that actually. If combined with Stargazing you can confirm someone’s class type with that.

Shrimpy:

Seems kind of strange. It’s exactly the same as occupying them except for some rare case differences like getting killed by reaper circle or showing up on observer follow.

Can still be gossiped, followed, and the only class types it actually screws over is Investigative.
Goal was to make the opposite of “Inner Cosmos”, try to make players suspicious, allow your Unseen to steal others abilities and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: Astromancer [BD Investigative] and Zodiac [Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Comet’s Trail (2 use): You will be notified if you visit the same player as your Target tonight.

So basically an investigative version of Hunter’s Mark? I like it.

Inner Cosmos (1 use): Choose 2 players. They will receive correct feedback tonight.

But Empower already does this …

Outer Void (1 use): Choose 2 players. Your targets will not receive any results tonight and will believe they were occupied.

Seems kind of strange. It’s exactly the same as occupying them except for some rare case differences like getting killed by reaper circle or showing up on observer follow.

Read full topic

item.title: Astromancer [BD Investigative] and Zodiac [Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Kape
item.description:
Astromancer is an amalgamation of Noble, Observer, Princess and Maid to some extend.

anon97870008:

Star Map: I think that’s fine, Noble doesn’t get wrong information either?

That’s just to save ourselves some trouble with deciding what his abilities would show on frames :^)

anon97870008:

Galaxy cross… sounds complicated. You might find a convert with that if you know MM, but I wouldn’t really know how to use it

It’s like a second hand flirt. You basically pick one person who’s class type you know and get the second target to visit someone. You would probably use it on [Killer/ Invest] and on a [Invest] for high value imo.

anon97870008:

Outer Void - what happens with occimmune classes?

I think they should still get the “You were occupied” feedback basically outing the Zodiac.
Should force people to pick better targets and not just blindly “occ” people.

Read full topic

item.title: Astromancer [BD Investigative] and Zodiac [Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: anon97870008
item.description:
Astromancer
Star Map: I think that’s fine, Noble doesn’t get wrong information either?
Stargazing is similar to gossip, it won’t give you as accurate information but it will trigger even for evils. Sounds alright.
Galaxy cross… sounds complicated. You might find a convert with that if you know MM, but I wouldn’t really know how to use it
The day abilities sound alright
I think that’s a special kind of noble ;^)

Zodiac
Outer Void - what happens with occimmune classes?
Basically an unseen scorned, allows to bus BDs ^^

Read full topic
